name: Ocean Tech Power, Inc.
description: Ocean Tech Power, Inc. is an innovative company specializing in renewable energy solutions, particularly focused on ocean and marine energy technologies. Established in 2010, the company has made significant strides in harnessing the power of ocean waves and tides to generate sustainable electricity. Ocean Tech Power aims to contribute to reducing global dependence on fossil fuels by developing advanced technologies that can capture and convert ocean energy into clean power. Their flagship products include wave energy converters and tidal turbines, which are designed to operate efficiently in various marine environments. The company is committed to research and development, collaborating with leading universities and research institutions to enhance the efficiency and viability of marine energy systems. Ocean Tech Power also emphasizes environmental sustainability and aims to minimize the ecological impact of their installations. With a growing portfolio of projects across coastal regions, the company is positioned to play a vital role in the transition to renewable energy sources, while also addressing the challenges of energy access in remote and island communities. As the world increasingly turns to alternative energy solutions, Ocean Tech Power is dedicated to innovation and excellence in the marine energy sector.

seo.meta_description: Explore Ocean Tech Power, Inc., a leader in renewable energy solutions focused on harnessing ocean and marine energy. Discover our innovative technologies and commitment to sustainability.

faq.answer: The CEO of Ocean Tech Power is Sarah Johnson.

faq.answer: Ocean Tech Power is headquartered in San Diego, California, USA.

faq.question: What are Ocean Tech Power's main products?
faq.answer: Ocean Tech Power's main products include wave energy converters and tidal turbines.

faq.answer: Ocean Tech Power was founded in 2010.
